renderpass.code:
#define mainImage(O, u )                                     \
    vec2 U = 24.* u/iResolution.y; ivec2 I = ivec2(U)/4;     \
    O += 1. - abs( mod( U[ (I.x+I.y) % 2 ], 2.) - 1.)
        

        
        
        
/**    // 117 chars

#define mainImage(O, u )                                     \
    vec2 U = 12.* u/iResolution.y,   I = ceil(U/2.);         \
    U = fract( mod(I.x+I.y,2.) < 1. ? U : U.yx ) * 2. - 1.;  \
    O += 1. - abs(U.x)       

/**/
renderpass.name: Image
